home.title: Your personalized path to better health
home.info:
In the Dietetycy XXI wieku application, we connect you with professional
          dietitians who will prepare an individual nutrition plan for you
          tailored to your needs, goals and lifestyle.
home.role_info: What can a client do and what can a dietitian do?
home.client_description:
For those looking for nutritional advice and meal
                planning
home.client_survey_info: Provide your parameters and habits to receive a personalized diet
home.client_stats_info: Monitor changes in your weight, body composition and diet effects
home.client_review: Evaluation of the received dietary profile
home.client_review_info: Express your opinion about the diet and help improve it
home.client_access_plans_info: Use dietary profiles prepared especially for you
home.client_view_results_info: Check what your test results say and how they affect your diet
home.client_notifications_info: Donâ€™t forget about tests and upcoming surveys
home.dietitian_description: For nutrition specialists managing clients and providing guidance
home.dietitian_manage_clients_info: Browse, filter, and choose the people you work with
home.dietitian_analyze_surveys_info: Assess client responses and build their dietary profile
home.dietitian_assign_plans_info: Design personalized plans tailored to client needs
home.dietitian_lab_analysis_info: Help clients understand their results and implement proper changes
home.dietitian_feedback_info: Collect feedback and improve your approach
home.dietitian_reminders_info: Encourage clients to take regular measurements and update their data
home.why_1_title: A personalized diet tailored to you
home.why_1_desc: Your needs are unique â€” your meal plan should be too. A dietitian analyzes your lifestyle, goals, and preferences to create a plan that truly works.
home.why_2_desc: Cholesterol, blood sugar, blood pressure â€” a well-matched diet can support your body in addressing common health issues.
home.why_3_desc: With the help of a dietitian, you'll learn how to compose meals, read labels, and avoid nutritional traps.
home.why_4_title: A diet aligned with your values
home.why_4_desc: Vegan? Keto? Gluten-free? Or a diet for Hashimotoâ€™s? Dietitians consider both your medical needs and personal beliefs.
home.why_5_desc: The right nutrients benefit not just your body, but also your mind. Feel the difference just days after switching to healthy eating.
